AN ACT 10 MAKE PROVISION FoR SAVINGS CARTIFICATES 10 BE GIVEN AS SECURITY TO THE GOVERNMENT OF CRYLON AND 70 LOCAL AUTHORITIES.
{Date of Assent; July 12, 1951.]

BE it enacted by the King’s Most Excellent Majesty, by and with the advice and consent of the Senate and the House of Representatives of Ceylon in this present Parliament assembled, and by the authority of the same, as followa:—
